room_config.description: The configuration for the chat room

channel_config.description: The configuration for the chat channel

name.description: The name of the extension, can be any string

command.description: The command to start the agent extension

name.description: Your name in the chat room

environment.description: environment, available values are Development, Staging, Production.

server_config.description: The configuration for the server. If provided, the client will start a server for chatroom service

workspace.description: The workspace to store logs, checkpoints and other files. The default value is the current directory.

string.description: The name of the room. Default is 'room'

integer.description: The port number where the room is hosted. Default is 30000

openAIClientConfiguration.description: openai configuration, this will be used to create openai client

lLMType.description: LLM provider, default is Azure OpenAI

string2.description: OpenAI model ID, default is gpt-3.5-turbo

string5.description: Azure OpenAI deploy name, default is $env:AZURE_OPENAI_DEPLOY_NAME

string6.description: Third-party LLM provider endpoint, default is $env:THIRD_PARTY_LLM_ENDPOINT

string7.description: Third-party LLM provider key, default is $env:THIRD_PARTY_LLM_KEY

string8.description: Third-party LLM provider model ID, default is $env:THIRD_PARTY_LLM_MODEL_ID
